dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1227 IH: Changing Age-Determined Eligibility To Student Incentive Payments Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bergman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To modify the age requirement for the Student Incentive Payment Program of the State maritime academies.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Changing Age-Determined Eligibility To Student Incentive Payments Act or the CADETS Act.

section.header: Age requirement for the Student Incentive Payment Program of the State maritime academies
section.text: Section 51509 of title 46, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: The Secretary may make an agreement under this section only with a qualified student who will meet the age requirement for enlistment in the Navy Reserve at the time of graduation from the academy.
